item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
The Kahin is a human priest serving the Jinnun of Iram. They worship the Ifrit Sultans as gods and expect to be rewarded when the Gates of Brass have been opened. They rarely involve themselves in military campaigns and prefer to administer the religious services of the human population.
